sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react'; import '../Css/ResultCard.css'; import '../Css/Popup.css'; import '../Css/Controls.css'; import { GlobalContext } from '../Global/GlobalState.js'; export const ResultCard = ({ anime }) => { const { moveAnimeToActive, moveAnimeToFinish, removeAnimeBothList, activeAnimeList, finishedAnimeList } = useContext(GlobalContext); const [popup, togglePopup] = useState(false); const [controlDrop, toggleControlDrop] = useState(false); let storedActiveAnime = activeAnimeList.find(o => o.id === anime.id); let storedFinishedAnime = finishedAnimeList.find(o => o.id === anime.id); // prevents you from adding already added anime const activeListDisabled = storedActiveAnime ? true : false; const finishedListDisabled = storedFinishedAnime ? true : false; return ( <> { (popup === false) ? (
togglePopup(true)} alt={anime.attributes.canonicalTitle} src={anime.attributes.posterImage.large} />
{anime.attributes.canonicalTitle}
{ (activeListDisabled) && ( ) (finishedListDisabled) && ( ) }
{ !controlDrop && (
moveAnimeToActive(anime)} className={activeListDisabled ? "item-active" : "item"}> Watching
moveAnimeToFinish(anime)} className={finishedListDisabled ? "item-active" : "item"}> Watched
toggleControlDrop(false)} className="item"> Planning
removeAnimeBothList(anime.id)} className="item"> Reset
) }
) : ( // feature
togglePopup(false)}>
{/* Controls here drop downs*/}

close popup

controls

Rating: {anime.attributes.averageRating}
Episodes: {anime.attributes.episodeCount}
Trailer

{anime.attributes.canonicalTitle}

{anime.attributes.description}

) } ) }
